Reviews.Title: Durable but slow.
Reviews.Author: matt manfredi
Reviews.Content: Phone is okay, Its durable but its suppppper slow.  I have dropped it and thrown it around and its great but its slow.

Reviews.Title: IP67 Certified, Really??
Reviews.Author: alrasova
Reviews.Content: They say that is completely dust proof and can withstand 30 minutes under water as long as it's less than 1 meter deep, well I call that BS, I tested mine and it got damaged on a bucket of water for 10 minutes.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS
Reviews.Author: Lisa Hall
Reviews.Content: I love this phone... Easy to use, durable and stylish. I have never had a problem with this phone and I give it 2 thumbs up. I was pleased with the seller also because it came as discribed and on time...

ProductInfo.Features:
3.65-inch LCD display
Android OS v2.3; Touchscreen
3.15 MP Camera
MP4/MP3 and Stereo FM Radiio w/ RDS
Bluetooth v3.0 with A2DP
